scenario_text.value:
Look, Takuma! I can see Pinochimon’s group
over there!
Huh, there they are...!
Damn, who thought we’d run into them here?!

Still, it doesn’t look like they’ve noticed
us yet, right?

In that case, let’s just wait around here
until they head off...

Then, like...we head the long way around to
the shrine?

I ain’t exactly proud of the idea, but we
could sneak up and catch them by surprise.

What should we do, Takuma? They’ll realize
we’re here soon!
(We don’t have time to mess around.)

(Should we hide before they find us? Take
a detour to the shrine now?)

(Or maybe we can hit them with a surprise
attack!)
(What’s the right plan here?)
Hide and wait.
Launch an ambush!
Make for the shrine.
Hide and wait.

I want to get to Miyuki as soon as we can.
Let’s hide here and wait.
Understood. Everyone, use the trees to hide!

Then do so swiftly, yet silently. They’ll
sense so many bodies moving at once.
I think everyone can hide over there, Takuma!
Okay, then let’s move right away!
I hope it’s that easy...
(Oh no! We’re making too much noise!)
Ah... AHHHHHH! It’s you guys!
Yikes! They spotted us already!
Launch an ambush!

It’s all or nothing here. Let’s dive in with
a surprise attack!

Hey, are you serious? That’s hardly the best
course of action.

I second that. If we’re gonna throw down,
let’s hit ’em straight on.

Er...but if we do that, it’ll just turn into
a fight like before...
If we gotta fight, we gotta fight.

Hey, is this really the time for
a discussion? If we keep talking—
You punks made it this far?!
Shoot, they heard us!
Make for the shrine.

I wanna head to the shrine right away, but we
should avoid running into those guys.

That’s why we should take a detour, so we can
head to the shrine without them noticing.
Not a bad decision.

Indeed. Slow and steady wins the race, as
they say.
But is there even a way around them, Takuma?
Well...

May I show you the way? I know the landscape
around the shrine more than most.
Okay... Lead the way, Professor!
Follow me.
...Okay, it should only be a bit farther now.
Wait... Stop, Akiharu! Don’t move!
Gabumon...?
Took you long enough!
Argh!
No, they headed us off at the pass?!

Damn... Surprise attack’s out of the question
now.
Guess we’re doing this!
Wait!
Aoi?!
Please, would you just hear me out?!
Who the heck’re you?!

That’s too dangerous, Aoi! They’re not the
type that’ll listen!

But the Master’s deceiving them! How can we
just attack them without saying anything?!
Deceiving us...?
Yes. The Master’s lying to you.

He may have told you that sacrificing human
children will save this world...

But that’s a total lie! The Master’s just
using you for his own purposes!

Please, just hear us out! There’s no reason
for us to fight, really!
Shut up! Shut up, shut up, shut uuup!

How can I believe the jerks who killed
Piemon?!
Well...

If you’re gonna talk nonsense, you’ll be the
first one to die!
Look out, Aoi!

The time for talk is over! We have no choice
but to fight!
Damn... You don’t gotta tell me twice!
Yeah! Agumon, everyone... Here we go!
Yeah! That goes without saying!
